title: New Pixel 3a XL with loose volume button. Is it OK?
content:
Dear All, hello and hope you can assist me this time too!

Got a new Pixel 3a XL today and found out the volume button to be a bit loose (in the direction of front/back) and even produce different "click" sound from time to time. The button is fully functional though but I'm wondering whether it's a common issue (since I discovered I'm not the only one with such "issue" and even not only on phones from Google) and can be safely ignored.

Thank you in advance!
